ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectOrder â€” Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-129 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. in respect of the construction and operation of the 2021 NGTL System Expansion Project
PrecisOrder directing the Canada Energy Regulator (CER) to issue a CERTIFICATE OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY GC-129 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. (NGTL) for the 2021 NGTL SYSTEM EXPANSION PROJECT in order to enable the expansion of the existing NGTL natural gas pipeline system that spans much of Alberta and parts of British Columbia.
